reviews.text: He's pretty chill with things, and really emphasizes learning about physical education. He has you take tests for units and gives in-class assignments sometimes. You do have to not be completely out of shape since he has requirements for rundays and the mile. As long as you don't mess around, you'll be good.
The best pe teacher I’ve ever had. He’s pretty chill and a good guy. He just wants you to try your best. Jokes around a lot, befriend him he’s cool.

he’s new but has so much energy and love for his students!! even if you’re not the most athletic this class will still be good for you. he just wants you to try your hardest. there are some tests but overall it doesn’t matter compared to how good the class is! befriend him, he’s a cool guy :)

best pe teacher i’ve ever had! he’s so caring and actually likes teaching the class. super understanding and such a nice guy (befriend him)!!! definitely recommend even if ur not athletic. he just cares about effort and is always down to joke around.
He’s an okay teacher. Wouldn’t really recommend him if you hate learning about sports and pe. He gives test and frequent worksheets. Overall he is okay.
He's a new teacher with good intentions for students to learn about sports. I wouldn't recommend him to students that hate/don't want to learn about sports. Otherwise he's a good teacher.
Pretty good teacher with fun units (other than hockey and golf)
